items.content_html:
I’m nearly 7 hours into Hollow Knight. I just got to the Soul Master. It’s a tough, but fun game so far.

I took a week+ break while I was sick. It’s a tough game to put down and then get back into. I also need to take frequent breaks from boss fights so I don’t become too frustrated with it.
items.content_text:
I'm nearly 7 hours into [Hollow Knight](https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/hollow-knight-switch/). I just got to the [Soul Master](https://hollowknight.fandom.com/wiki/Soul_Master). It's a tough, but fun game so far. 

I took a week+ break while I was sick. It's a tough game to put down and then get back into. I also need to take frequent breaks from boss fights so I don't become too frustrated with it.

items.content_html:
Finally feeling better. Still not 100% yet.

Probably the best time to sick, I am already off from work.

items.title: A (Micro) Blogging Reboot
items.content_html:
You may have noticed that I’ve re-enabled a bit of a blogging feature here on the site. It’s a micro blog. I’m using micro.blog to host the (micro) blog.

I’ve used micro.blog in the past and enjoyed it. I also like supporting small independent developers. I’m glad to be back.

I will not be bringing over any previous posts. You can get to those in the (archived) GitHub repo (blog.ryangrier.com). This is a clean slate.

The plan is to use this (micro) blog to post a mixture of short/long form posts.

When I had my previous blog going, I tried to focus on tech-related posts. That didn’t work out for me. I would post infrequently. I eventually gave up. I hope that a mix of short/long posts I’ll post a bit more.

We’ll see how this goes. Stay tuned?
items.content_text:
You may have noticed that I've re-enabled a bit of a blogging feature here on the site. It's a micro blog. I'm using [micro.blog](https://micro.blog) to host the (micro) blog. 

I've used micro.blog in the past and enjoyed it. I also like supporting small independent developers. I'm glad to be back. 

I will not be bringing over any previous posts. You can get to those in the (archived) GitHub repo ([blog.ryangrier.com](https://github.com/rwgrier/blog.ryangrier.com)). This is a clean slate. 

The plan is to use this (micro) blog to post a mixture of short/long form posts. 

When I had my previous blog going, I tried to focus on tech-related posts. That didn't work out for me. I would post infrequently. I eventually gave up. I hope that a mix of short/long posts I'll post a bit more. 

We'll see how this goes. Stay tuned?
